sourcesContent:
export const spotifyButton = {
  background: '#1DB954',
  border: 'none',
  borderRadius: '30px',
  boxShadow: '0px 4px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)',
  color: 'white',
  cursor: 'pointer',
  fontSize: '14px',
  fontWeight: 'bold',
  padding: '12px 24px',
  transition: 'all 0.2s ease-in-out',
  textTransform: 'uppercase',

  };

  export const appleButton = {
    borderRadius: '25px',
    backgroundColor: '#1DB954',
    color: '#FFFFFF',
    padding: '16px 32px',
    fontWeight: 'bold',
    boxShadow: '0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontSize: '16px',
    display: 'inline-block',
    textDecoration: 'none',
    textTransform: 'uppercase',
    letterSpacing: '1px',
    transition: 'all 0.3s ease-in-out',
    border: 'none',
    margin: '10px 0',
  };
